title: Old masters, new visions: from the Phillips Collection
creator_credit: Australian Capital TV, Australian National Gallery, Steve Isaac and Robert Walker
brief_description: This video features a selection from the 71 works exhibited as the “Old Masters-New Visions” exhibition, from the Phillips Collection, Washington DC, at the Australian National Gallery, Canberra, the Art Gallery of Western Australia, Perth and the Art Gallery of South Australia, Adelaide. The video was shot in the Australian National Gallery and features the works of El Greco, Goya, Chardin, Ingres, Constable, Courbet, Monet, Cezanne, Renoir, Van Gogh, Rousseau, Marc, Kandinsky, Bonnard, Braque, Matisse and Rothko.
